list-fruits.description: Lists the fruits FarmCaveSpawn can spawn.
mod.description: Spawns random fruit tree products into the farm cave.
max-spawns.title: Max Daily Spawns
max-spawns.description: The maximum amount of fruit per day for this mod to spawn
spawn-chance.title: Spawn Chance (Percent)
spawn-chance.description: Percent chance any particular empty tile will have a fruit on it.
tree-fruit-chance.title: Tree Fruit Chance (Percent)
tree-fruit-chance.description: Percent chance each spawn will be a tree fruit.
cave-type.title: Ignore Farm Cave Type
cave-type.description: If enabled, spawns fruit in all cave types
early-cave.title: Allow Early Fruit Cave
early-cave.description: Spawns fruit even before the fruit cave cutscene.
use-mine.title: Use Mine Entrance
use-mine.description: Allows fruits to spawn in the mine entrance as well (after spawning in the Farm Cave, if Max Daily Spawns is not yet hit.
seasonal-only.title: Seasonal Fruit Only
seasonal-only.description: Restrict to this season's fruit only
any-category.title: Allow Any Tree Product
any-category.dsecription: If enabled, all products from fruit trees are allowed. If disabled, restricted to just fruit.
edibles.title: Restrict to Edible
nobananas.title: No Bananas Before Shrine
nobananas.description: Prevents bananas from showing up before one's given to the banana shrine.
